item.title: GitHub Contribute URL
item.description:
UPDATE: I found out today that one of my colleague’s Justin Kenyon, a Staff Engineer at GitHub, was the author of this feature. Very cool I’ve been sharing this with many folks and learning he created it. ðŸ˜„ Thank you for this feature Justin.

I sometimes get asked what is the best way to contribute to an open-source project. If the project is hosted on GitHub, there is a helper URL for each repository that will highlight any issues that the maintainers have labelled with good first issue or help wanted.
